text: LOCAL BUS DISAPPEARS announced the Dinas Advertiser. But the London papers ignored the whole affair. Ifor Evans reported his loss to the police. But they only tut-tutted. "Lost a bus, is it. Very careless." That was their attitude. Now if there'd been a good old accident, they could have measured up the road and taken an interest.
